original_text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples, which are not written in this book:
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들 앞에서 이 책에 기록되지 아니한 다른 표적도 많이 행하셨으나

sentences.original_text: And many other signs truly did Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수님은 참으로 많은 다른 표적들을 행하셨는데

sentences.original_text: in the presence of his disciples
which are not written in this book:
